note.p: Tutor. BA, University of London, 1857. Running a school in Lambeth in 1861. By 1901, tutor at Sandown, Isle of Wight.
Census returns of England and Wales 1861 (The National Archives: Public Record Office RG9/364/86/25), 1901 (RG13/1027/46/29)
England & Wales, national probate calendar (index of wills and administrations), 1858–1966, 1973–95 (Ancestry.com, accessed 23 March 2018)
England & Wales, non-conformist and non-parochial registers, 1567–1970 (Ancestry.com, accessed 23 March 2018)
UK, University of London student records, 1836–1936 (Ancestry.com, accessed 23 March 2018)
